title: The First year
creator_credit: Barbara A. Chobocky and Documentary Films
brief_description:
Episode number 3 of Series “The Tresillian child development series”.
Looks at the important role that fathers can play in the development of their growing child. Centres around three young couples from varied social backgrounds, each with their first child. Suitable for Upper Secondary School students.
